sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The epistle of Erasmus Roterodamus, sente vnto Conradus Pelicanus concerning his opinion of the blessed sacrament of Christes body and bloude. Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
[16] p.
In ædibus Iohannis Cawodi, typographi Reginæ Mariæ, Excusum Londini : Anno. 1554.
Original title not traced. Signatures: A. The last leaf is blank. Running title reads: A godly treatise of the blessed sacrament. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
